##Initialisation

```{r}
library(CreDating)
library(ape)
set.seed(0)
data(harris2010)
plot(harris2010$tree, show.tip.label = F)
axisPhylo(backward = F)
```

##Root-to-tip analysis

Let's do a root-to-tip regression analysis:

```{r}
res=roottotip(harris2010$tree,harris2010$dates)
```

##Analysis

We run CreDating as follows:

```{r}
ptm=proc.time()
res=credate(unroot(harris2010$tree),harris2010$dates,nbIts=100000)
print(proc.time()-ptm)
plot(res,'treeCI',show.tip.label = F)
```

We can see what the MCMC traces look like:

```{r}
  plot(res,'trace')
```
Let's see where the root is likely to be:
```{r}
plot(res,'treeRoot',show.tip.label=F)
```
